statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.DICTIONARY_ID DESC) AS ROW_NO , AA.DICTIONARY_ID , AA.LOGICAL_NAME , AA.PHYSICAL_NAME , AA.DESCRIPTION , AA.INS_TIME , AA.INS_USER , U1.USER_NAME AS INS_USER_NAME , AA.UPD_TIME , AA.UPD_USER , U2.USER_NAME AS UPD_USER_NAME FROM UAA.DICTIONARIES AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.INS_USER = U1.USER_ID LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.UPD_USER = U2.USER_ID WHERE 1=1
AND AA.LOGICAL_NAME LIKE '%' + #FIND_TEXT# + '%'
AND AA.DICTIONARY_ID = #DICTIONARY_ID#
ORDER BY ROW_NO
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO UAA.DICTIONARIES ( LOGICAL_NAME, PHYSICAL_NAME, DESCRIPTION, INS_TIME, INS_USER ) VALUES ( #LOGICAL_NAME#, #PHYSICAL_NAME#, #DESCRIPTION#, GETDATE(), #INS_USER# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS DICTIONARY_ID
statements.update: UPDATE UAA.DICTIONARIES SET LOGICAL_NAME = #LOGICAL_NAME# , PHYSICAL_NAME = #PHYSICAL_NAME# , DESCRIPTION = #DESCRIPTION# , UPD_TIME = GETDATE() , UPD_USER = #INS_USER# WHERE DICTIONARY_ID = #DICTIONARY_ID#
